Name: Marker
Desc:
Injects magic into small fragments in the air to make them grow and crushes them.
An Ether Crystal forms at the crushed location and ignores re-creation cooldown.
Required Skill. Resonance Lv. 10 or above

H.Old:
MP Cost: 250. Creates fragments at locations of up to 7 enemies.
Whenever a fragment is created or crushed, it each attacks up to 7 enemies at 2000% DAMAGE 6 times.
If fewer than the maximum number of attackable enemies exist, create up to 7 fragments at random locations.
Enemies with Grave will have half as many fragments. Attacks up to 7 enemies at 2500% DAMAGE 6 times.
Creates up to 7 Ether Crystals after the fragments are crushed.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
